alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County Southeast; Imperial County Southwest; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 1:03AM PST until February 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Southwest corner of Imperial County, Salton Sea, Chuckwalla Mountains, Southeastern Imperial County, Western Imperial County and Imperial Valley. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects will become airborne. Moderate tree and minor structural damage possible.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County Southeast; Imperial County Southwest; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Salton Sea
